sub_title: SAP Services Architecture Expert  at SAP
summary:
Business consultant with 20 years+ experience within the field of SAP Orderfullfilment, Sourcing and Procurement, Supply Chain Management, Financial Shared Services. Passionate about Business 
Pprocess Modelling. S/4HANA Cloud certified consultant. Certified Celonis Analyst. Certified Srum Master and Product Owner.
Business Architect advising clients on the future state of the enterprise architecture that is needed to execute on the proposed business strategy.
Team Leadership - Finance Applications. Senior Business Process Expert in Financial Shared Services, including Robotic Process Automation (RPA) initiatives. 

Think globally, act locally, being worldly.

Working locally and internationally for multinational companies like Philips, NXP, Nexperia, DSM, Sabic, AKZO, Oce using his professional skills in combination with his ability to connect (with) people all over the world. 

Specialties: SAP Supply Chain Management and Logistics + Financial Shared Services

S/4HANA Cloud Purchasing 2021 certified consultant
Robotic Process Automation (RPA)
Process Mining with Celonis
Order To Cash, Warehouse Management, Purchase to Pay
Document Management, Enterprise Content Management, Invoice Capture Centre 
Business Process Outsourcing, Project Management
Output Management, Archiving, SAAS and Cloud-solutions for Output Management and Archiving

projects.title: Implementation Invoice Capture Center for SAP Solutions (ICC) Robotization Initiative
projects.description: The goal of this project is to implement Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for vendor invoice processing with the aim to improve quality and increase efficiency. The goal of this Robotization Initiative is to replace the current manual process of datacapturing, leading to quality improvements and workforce savings. In scope are all DSM units serviced by FSS covering EMEA, APAC, North America using 9 SAP instances running Vendor Invoice Management for SAP Solutions . All instances up and running and still adding company codes reaching for 100+. Collaboration with speed delivering fast results in a complex architecture. Teaming up with the Global Delivery Center in Hyderabad and the core project team being in NL delivered a wining solution. System and process are in place: practice makes perfect as we are learning from the results.

contributors.headline: SAP Services Architecture Expert  at SAP

projects.title: Schils
projects.description:
Introduced digital archiving for invoices using SAP Archive Link functionality in order to meet fiscal and legal requirements. Rapid deployment to get ready in time for year 2013 invoicing.
Making the issue- and problemlist manageable and get the SAP-system going (again) in the area of order to cash and supply chain management. Providing applied solutions to reduce the workload for the operations team.

contributors.headline: SAP Services Architecture Expert  at SAP

projects.title: Supplier change output processing commercial documents
projects.description:
NXP sends data files for invoices and other commercial documents from the SAP-NXP-system to a 'document design platform' where data is transformed to actual output: PDF, PCL, and mail. Commercial output is very important in the execution of business processes.
This data processing is an externally purchased service, delivered since 1999. In 2011 this service was identified as a potential high cost saver after we gained experience with the choice of a new cloud platform for archiving commercial invoices from the SAP NXP system. Introducing a new partner, Ricoh,really outside the Philips-heritage, forced NXP to depict and organize the technical infrastructure again.
The starting point was a no change approach. From a business user perspective, the look and feel of the output should remain identical to the current situation.
The new situation has been up-and-running since July 2012 and is proving to be a swift working service at signifcantly reduced costs. Thanks to the teamwork of NXP, Ricoh and Atos this job was done "Excellent Together"!

Pre-sales Consultant for S4/HANA prospects.
SAP Consultant S/4HANA SCM Unite project Nederlandse Spoorwegen.
profile_positions.title: SAP Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
Nexperia is the divestement of NXP Semiconductors Standard Products Business. Nexperia will be especially increasing focus on automotive applications. 

The Team Lead – Finance applications is responsible for application functionality and application
quality in the area of Finance, Controlling and Consolidation. The Team Lead is responsible for the translation of business requirements into IT solutions.
After a hefty year 2017, making the disentanglement from NXP happen, heading for new horizons. Investigating opportunities to support a fast growing company: SAP S/4HANA Finance, Treasury Management, RPA-initiatives, whilst growing a brand new team.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead – Finance Applications

profile_positions.description:
Financial Shared Services (FSS) is part of DSM Business Services (DBS). The goal of the FSS is to provide effective, efficient and customer-oriented service delivery, so the DSM units are able to focus on their core activities. As a result the Accounting services of FSS have been re-organized in terms of service delivery splitting the service delivery by regional Front Offices and one Global Delivery Centre (located in Hyderabad, India).
The Business Process Expert supports optimal operations and steering in the FSS by determining and executing activities in the financial functional area for the implementation of the financial standard business processes (single standard) as well as for the development of new and/or improved financial processes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Process Expert Accounts Payables | Receivables (Financial Shared Services)

profile_positions.description: My company sapvisor provides consultancy and project management services  where SAP meets business and business meets SAP, focusing on both shared services initiatives and logistics and supply chain challenges including Process Mining and RPA-initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Prepared a project proposal to redesign the service contract for commercial output from the SAP system: reducing spent and introducing new capabilities. Feasibility study executed, including discussions with possible suppliers.

Introduced a SaaS / cloud model succesfully as an archiving solution for commercial output from the SAP ECC 6.0 system. Launched the SpringCM platform as the enterprise content management system for this purpose. Launching SpringCM January 2011 giving already 1,5 Mio documents of real life experience!

Worked on the financial redesign of the NXP SAP set-up for EMEA and APAC, eliminating internal and inter-company invoicing. Removing local design and switching-over to global requirements and simplified processes. Responsible for the transformation of the customer consignment set-up and the redesign of commercial output (invoices, order acknowledgements, rma's, statements of account). Executed both in Europe and on-site in Asia. Succesfully finalized by the end of 2009. Member of the flawless-go-live award winning team.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Expert Commercial Order Fulfillment

profile_positions.description: Under the umbrella of  the long term strategy DSM decided to sell a part of the DSM Exclusive Synthesis / Intermediates business in Linz, Austria: a so called divestment. Part of the divestment deal is the IT-infrastructure. Preparing the set-up of an independent SAP R/3 system for the Intermediates business based upon the ProjectInitiationDocument (PID). Using a proof-of-concept approach to prepare a ready-to-run cut-over scenario.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager ERP carve out
